<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="/f014007cec0899e95e24d40eaee811dd.css">
  </head>
  <body>
    <canvas id="canvas" width="210px" height="210px"></canvas>
    <script>var canvas = document.getElementById("canvas");
canvas.width = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
canvas.height = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
var ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
ctx.fillStyle = "black";
ctx.strokeStyle = "none";
ctx.lineWidth = 4;
ctx.lineCap = "round";

function drawline(x1, y1, x2, y2) {
  ctx.beginPath();
  ctx.moveTo(x1, y1);
  ctx.lineTo(x2, y2);
  ctx.stroke();
} //   drawline(0,0,100,200)


var painting = false;
var last;
var isTouchDevice = ("ontouchstart" in document.documentElement);
console.log(isTouchDevice); // if (isTouchDevice) {
//   // console.log("hahah");
//   canvas.ontouchmove = (c) => {
//     // console.log(c)
//     // console.log(c.touches[0])
//     let x = c.touches[0].clientX;
//     let y = c.touches[0].clientY;
//     // console.log(x,y)
//     ctx.beginPath();
//     ctx.arc(x, y, 10, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
//     ctx.stroke();
//     ctx.fill();
//   };

if (isTouchDevice) {
  canvas.ontouchstart = function (c) {
    var x = c.touches[0].clientX;
    var y = c.touches[0].clientY;
    last = [x, y];
  };

  canvas.ontouchmove = function (c) {
    var x = c.touches[0].clientX;
    var y = c.touches[0].clientY;
    console.log(last);
    drawline(last[0], last[1], x, y);
    last = [x, y];
  };
} else {
  canvas.onmousedown = function (e) {
    painting = true;
    last = [e.clientX, e.clientY];
    console.log(last);
  };
}

canvas.onmousemove = function (e) {
  if (painting === true) {
    console.log(last);
    drawline(last[0], last[1], e.clientX, e.clientY);
    last = [e.clientX, e.clientY]; //   drawline(0,0,e.clientX,e.clientY)
    // ctx.beginPath();
    // ctx.arc(e.clientX, e.clientY, 10, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
    // ctx.stroke();
    // ctx.fill();
    // ctx.fillRect(e.clientX - 5, e.clientY -5,10,10)
  }
};

canvas.onmouseup = function () {
  painting = false;
};</script>
  </body>
</html>
